name: anycable-go
description: Performant and feature-rich WebSocket server for Rails and Ruby applications.

ANYCABLE_RPC_IMPL.description: RPC implementation (use HTTP for simplified Heroku deployments)

ANYCABLE_RPC_HOST.description: URL of the HTTP RPC embedded into your web application

ANYCABLE_HTTP_RPC_SECRET.description: A secret token to authenticate HTTP RPC requests (must be configured for both applications)
